section.title: Plan of Treatment
section.text:
Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week. Follow up with
Outpatient facility.
In case of high fever, take Tylenol as needed.

section.title: Assessments
section.text:
The patient Mr John Wright was found to have a first degree burns and Dr Seven and his staff treated
Mr Wright by cleaning the burn and dressing the burn and observed for couple of hours before
discharging Mr Wright.

section.title: Hospital Discharge Instructions
section.text:
Physician Documentation
Discharge Instructions
a. Appointments: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week. Followup with Outpatient
facility.
b. In Case of fever, Take tylenol as advised in plan of treatment.
